english.segment1: Love the Lord your God. With all your heart. With all your soul. With all your mind. And with all your strength (2x)
english.segment2: With all your heart. With all your soul. With all your mind. And with all your strength. Love the Lord your God. With all your heart. With all your soul. With all your mind. And with all your strength
english.segment3: I will serve the Lord. With all my heart. With all my soul. With all my mind. And with all my strength (2x)
english.segment4: With all my heart. With all my soul. With all my mind. And with all my strength. I will serve the Lord. With all my heart. With all my soul. With all my mind. And with all my strength
english.segment5: I will love You (I will love You). I will praise You (I will praise You). I will serve You, Lord (I will serve You). I will trust You, Lord (I will trust You)
english.segment6: And with all my heart. With all my soul. With all my mind. And with all my strength. With all my heart. With all my soul. With all my mind. With all my strength
english.segment7: I will love You Lord. With all my heart. With all my soul. With all my mind. And with all my strength (3x)
